item.title: At the Ballot: Stand for Democracy
item.description:
You either believe in democracy and all it stands for, or you don’t. Despite the noise from politicians, pundits, and media misdirection, the voting booth choice comes down to a fundamental question about American governance.

Both parties have made missteps over the years, but this moment is different. Today’s Republican party has embraced authoritarian tactics: refusing to accept legitimate election results, supporting efforts to overturn the 2020 election, proposing to use presidential power against political opponents, and praising dictators abroad. These aren’t abstract concernsâ€”they represent a clear departure from democratic norms that have held for generations.
